Question: Still, trailing by 6 late in the game this person led the Colts on a 77-yard TD drive to take a 21–20 lead.
Hints: At San Diego, this person threw for 255 yards, 2 TDs and 1 INT in a 23–20 victory.
This person led the league with 4,267 passing yards and threw 29 touchdowns; he was named first-team All-Pro and to the Pro Bowl.
This person reached an agreement with the Broncos on a five-year contract worth $96 million on March 20, 2012.
